description.en: If, on a Sunday, `amAvasyA` and one of the stars—`zravaNam`, `azvinI`, `zraviSThA`, `ArdrA` or `AzrESA`—occurs, then it is called `vyatIpAta yOGaH`, equal to a hundred _Surya grahanas_ in merit.

references_secondary: Smrti Mukthaphalam Shraddha Kandam Uttara Bhaga
shlokas:
zravaNAzvidhaniSThArdrAnAgadaivatamApatEt.
ravivArayutAmAyAM vyatIpAtaH sa ucyatE.
vyatIpAtAkhyayOgO'yaM zatArkagrahasannibhaH..
